title: Define Gaming: Defining your gaming experience

embed.description: Define Gaming is an multi-gaming community featuring gamers from around the world!

body:
**Define Gaming [DG]**
http://www.define-gaming.com 

**Background
**
Define Gaming is a multigaming community centered around constant improvement based off member feedback and strong admin-to-community communication. Founded in October 2015 by leaders who have had years of clan/community management, Define Gaming is already looking strong with OVER 300 members, an active forum, and a Teamspeak3 server. With much persistence and dedication, we look forward to the future and always aim higher than everywhere else to make our members' experiences the best they can possibly be. It's up to you to define what you want your gaming experience to be!

**Rules & Member Complaints**

In Define Gaming, we want to ensure that everyone has an enjoyable experience. Define Gaming has a set of rules and a member complaint system to hold people to respectable standards and punish those who choose not to meet them. Our rule list can't be found here they are on our website.

**Member Ranks & Staff**

We believe in rewarding members for their activity in our community and on our forums. Define Gaming has a simple user ranking system for members that put their time into Define Gaming, along with various staff positions for people who want to improve Define Gaming, as well as help it grow.

**How to Join Define Gaming**

Joining Define Gaming is simple, as we understand people want to jump in game as soon as possible. Visit our website, create an account, authorize your email, then post an introduction in our Introductions forum.

From there, a staff member will approve your introduction and welcome you to the community. Feel free to write as much as you'd like for your introduction. Keep it short, follow our suggested template, or freestyle, which ever defines you best. From that point forward, a staff member from your respective main game will add you and do their best to help you get started in Define Gaming. If you have any questions, check the references section below.

**References - For more information, please contact the following people in-game, here, or on our website:**
